EmailTemplate.name: 18-TEPS-Energy-Email-nurture Utilities-T0021Q.Stream 1_Email 4_Private utility
EmailTemplate.subject: Need to reduce your communications network outsourcing costs?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> The case for private utility networks An option whose time has come You have relied on carriers for network communications services, but now you need to find a better way. That’s because the rising costs of legacy carrier services like TDM and frame relay are impacting your bottom line. On top of that, you need to find cost-effective alternatives <[[https://blog.networks.nokia.com/mobile-networks/2017/07/10/private-utility-networks-make-dollars-sense/?did=d000000000e0&utm_campaign=utilities_moderniz.&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=why-private-networks&utm_term=marketo]]> to support new and existing mission-critical grid control applications. What is the best approach? © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
